TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "tube_coral", "quantity": 23, "index": 13}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_brick_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 16}, {"type": "light_blue_carpet", "quantity": 40, "index": 22}, {"type": "polished_blackstone_stairs", "quantity": 45, "index": 24}, {"type": "silverfish_spawn_egg", "quantity": 64, "index": 27}, {"type": "yellow_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "iron_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "music_disc_stal", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "stone", "quantity": 4, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft mossy_stone_bricks, I first need to craft stone_bricks. Stone_bricks require 4 stone, so I will move the first stone from slot 39 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 39 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok

Ok
